name: Crimson Defense
description: Protect yourself from the zombies waves at your base. Crimson Defense is a defense against the hordes of zombies that attack you, with each wave stronger and stronger. You're the only one who survived, stay as long as possible.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Core 2 Duo or higher Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 512 MB Video RAM Storage: 900 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Core 4 Duo or higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 1 GB Video RAM Storage: 900 MB available space
